definition: to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: They kept dunning us about the overdue bill.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直在向我們催討過期的賬款。

sentences.english: Though the Plaintiff has repeatedly demanded the payment, the Defendant fails to liquidate the outstanding debts in due time.
sentences.chinese: 儘管原告多次催討貨款，被告仍未能清償到期債務。

sentences.english: If you would make an enemy,lend a man money and ask it of him again.
sentences.chinese: 你若想與人結怨，只須先借錢給他，再向他催討。

sentences.english: He duns me for payment of debt.
They are urgent for payment of arrears of wages.
